title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config and data into a single Modelfile; macOS/Linux/Windows, REST & CLI APIs.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API; pip-installable wrapper that exposes chat, generate, embed, pull, list, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package ollama provides chat, generate, streaming helpers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) supplying LLM, chat and embeddings components backed by local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); chat interface, model management, RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven package offers sync/async APIs, streaming, utils for chat, generate, pull, list.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST endpoints; tokio/hyper based.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, chat, switch models, syntax-highlighted Markdown in terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant; supports chat sidebar & inline edits.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; provides OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama + Chroma; ingest PDFs, query via CLI.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama server with CUDA support and optional Open WebUI container.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes; supports GPU nodes, PVC, ingress, autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: NVIDIA integration docs & container patches enabling TensorRT-LLM and NGC model pulls within Ollama.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager wrapper around Ollama’s REST API; async/await, Combine publishers, macOS SwiftUI sample app.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Experimental gRPC proxy in front of Ollama REST server; protobuf definitions for chat, generate, embeddings.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models as async views/channels; admin panel to pull & manage models.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice template that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate-limiting, and OpenAPI docs for enterprise usage.

title: ollama-rust-embeddings
summary: Rust utility leveraging ollama-rs to batch-generate embeddings and store in Qdrant; CLI for similarity search.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that streams Ollama responses; includes sidebar model selector and token-speed metrics.
